text: Athe haele ba lutseng malapeng a bona, kantle le likooa, ha ba lekane le ba tsitlalletseng ho loanela tsela ea Allah ka thepa le ka botho ba bona. Allah U fane ka maemo a phahameng ho ba tsitlalletseng ka thepa ea bona le ka botho ba bona bo phahametseng ba pharameng malapeng a bona. Etsoe e mong le e mong Allah U ba ts’episitse botle, empa o ts’olletse moputso o moholo-hali ho ba tsitlaletseng o phahametseng ba pharameng malapeng a bona
